parameters.name: PE_N_F0
parameters.description: Spectral power of E field in normal mode at F0

parameters.name: PB_N_F0
parameters.description: Spectral power of B field in normal mode at F0

parameters.name: NVEC_N_F0
parameters.description: Wave normal vector from magnetic field in normal mode at F0 in the SCM B1-B2-B3 axis system frame.

parameters.name: NVEC_N_F0_SRF
parameters.description: Wave normal vector from magnetic field in normal mode at F0 in spacecraft reference frame (SRF).

parameters.name: ELLIP_N_F0
parameters.description: Wave ellipticity from magnetic field in normal mode at F0

parameters.name: DOP_N_F0
parameters.description: degree of polarization from magnetic field in normal mode at F0

parameters.name: SX_REA_N_F0
parameters.description: Real part of the X component of the Poynting vector in normal mode at F0

parameters.name: SX_ARG_N_F0
parameters.description: Argument bit = 0 if |ARG(SX)| < pi/4 or 3pi/4 < |ARG(SX)| < pi, bit arg = 1 elsewhere in normal mode at F0

parameters.name: VPHI_REA_N_F0
parameters.description: Phase velocity estimated from the X projection of Maxwell-Faraday equation in normal mode at F0

parameters.name: VPHI_ARG_N_F0
parameters.description: Argument bit = 0 if |ARG(VPHI)| < pi/4 or 3pi/4 < |ARG(VPHI)| < pi, bit arg = 1 elsewhere in normal mode at F0
